channel.title: Comments on: Corona Geek #82 – Particle Designer 2.0 Demos, Windows Phone, and App Monetization

item.title: By: dingo
item.dc:creator: dingo
item.description:
Charles: I was at GDC 13, and I think the game you have been talking about (3d printable characters) was Spaceqube.
https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/space-qube/id670674729?mt=8
item.content:encoded:
Charles: I was at GDC 13, and I think the game you have been talking about (3d printable characters) was Spaceqube.

https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/space-qube/id670674729?mt=8
